name: College Pulse
headline: Research and analytics company focused on college students.
description: College Pulse is the leading research and analytics company focused on college students. We have built the largest database of college student opinion with over 700K student panelists from 1500 universities in all 50 states, and we use our student panel to help our clients better understand the college demographic. Our ambition is to become a unique part of the global internet infrastructure - like Google for search, Facebook for social, Amazon for retail, we want it to be Pulse for public opinion.

# The Voice ofCollege Students
Data-driven marketing and custom research solutions to help businesses and nonprofit organizations better understand and connect with American college students.
[GET IN TOUCH](https://collegepulse.com/</#contactus>)[STUDENT SIGN UP](https://collegepulse.com/<https:/survey.collegepulse.com/jfe/form/SV_ai0lv787hpXWN94?growthChannel=web>)
![icon](https://collegepulse.com/icons/call_responses.svg)
### 130,000,000+
##### Responses Collected
![icon](https://collegepulse.com/icons/call_student.svg)
### 800,000+
##### Students Signed Up
![icon](https://collegepulse.com/icons/call_school.svg)
### 1500+
##### College Campuses
##### OUR RESEARCH IS TRUSTED BY:
![Company Logo](https://collegepulse.com/companies/nyt.svg)![Company Logo](https://collegepulse.com/companies/kf.svg)![Company Logo](https://collegepulse.com/companies/bnp.svg)![Company Logo](https://collegepulse.com/companies/dell.svg)![Company Logo](https://collegepulse.com/companies/forbes.svg)![Company Logo](https://collegepulse.com/companies/fivethirtyeight.svg)![Company Logo](https://collegepulse.com/companies/ge.svg)![Company Logo](https://collegepulse.com/companies/chegg.svg)
  * ![Tab Icon](https://collegepulse.com/icons/tabs/research.svg)Custom Research
  * ![Tab Icon](https://collegepulse.com/icons/tabs/trackers.svg)Brand Trackers
  * ![Tab Icon](https://collegepulse.com/icons/tabs/reports.svg)Syndicated Reports


## Custom Research
Work with our team of survey experts to design custom research on the student demographic. Whether you need to interview computer science majors at MIT, students at online universities or a nationally representative sample, we’ve got you covered.
[GET IN TOUCH](https://collegepulse.com/</#contactus>)
"College Pulse is an outstanding research partner - highly responsive and collaborative from start to finish. We have findings in hand in a matter of days and an insightful, visually engaging report within weeks. Thank you for designing efficiency and quality into your offering."
##### Evette Alexander
Director of Learning & Impact, Knight Foundation
![Person](https://collegepulse.com/)![Person](https://collegepulse.com/static/2d708beede2a2b2915b296474a374dc4/2a4de/kf_black.png)
![Illustration](https://collegepulse.com/ill/research.svg)
## Why College Pulse?
![Why College Pulse?](https://collegepulse.com/icons/why_reach.svg)
#### Unparalleled Reach
Our American College Student Panel is the largest of it's kind with more than 800,000 college student and recent grads from 1500 two and four-year colleges and universities in all 50 states.
![Why College Pulse?](https://collegepulse.com/icons/why_method.svg)
#### Rigorous Methodology
Crafted by industry veterans with extensive opinion polling backgrounds, our methodology ensures we present data that accurately reflects the attitudes and opinions of your target population.
![Why College Pulse?](https://collegepulse.com/icons/why_student.svg)
#### College Student Experts
No one understands college students better than us. We've collected more than 100 million responses from students around the country.
## Featured Research Projects
![Left Arrow](https://collegepulse.com/icons/leftarr.svg)
## The Wall Street Journal / College Pulse 2025 College Best College Rankings
The Wall Street Journal/College Pulse 2025 Best Colleges in the U.S. ranking rates the top 500 universities in the country.
[READ THE REPORT](https://collegepulse.com/</blog/the-wall-street-journal-college-pulse-2025-college-best-college-rankings>)
[![Featured Project](https://collegepulse.com/)![Featured Project](https://collegepulse.com/static/945a5351bce0b22445a781a01d1823ed/ee604/Screen-Shot-2023-09-06-at-12.37.55-PM.png)](https://collegepulse.com/</blog/the-wall-street-journal-college-pulse-2025-college-best-college-rankings>)
![Right Arrow](https://collegepulse.com/icons/rightarr.svg)
### News & Research
See all our latest research projects and how they’re leveraged to create impact.
[See Our Latest Findings![Right Arrow](https://collegepulse.com/icons/rightarr.svg)](https://collegepulse.com/</blog/page/1>)
## What our clients say.
College Pulse partners with leading academic researchers, prominent think tanks, and global brands to conduct ground-breaking research on the college demographic. Here’s what they’re saying about us:
![Company Logo](https://collegepulse.com/)![Company Logo](https://collegepulse.com/static/b30811b9cc06b5e252af79e3cf8c290e/ee604/chegg.png)
"We were incredibly fortunate to work with College Pulse on the Chegg/College Pulse Election Tracker. The project was very ambitious, but they not only were able to deliver on a large scale, they exceeded my expectations on everything from framing the research questions to methodological rigor to presentation of insights. They were very easy to work with and a truly turn-key solution -- more importantly, their extra efforts helped us exceed our business goals for the project.”
#### Bonny Brown
Head of Research, Chegg
![Company Logo](https://collegepulse.com/)![Company Logo](https://collegepulse.com/static/61dcfd8cf4415becd31660c153706ae9/ee604/nasce.png)
“College Pulse ignited our study of civic engagement and global citizenry. After conducting our study one college at a time, College Pulse’s robust panel allowed us to understand all American college students commitment to serve and development pursuant to most college missions quickly and with the highest methodological standards.”
#### Don Levy, Ph.D
NASCE, Director Siena College Research Institute and Principal Investigator
## Ready to get started?
![Phone right](https://collegepulse.com/)![Phone right](https://collegepulse.com/static/6562b70167a9ca9a4bbc152d4afbd434/21564/new_phone1.png)
## In College? Be Counted!
Get accurate data about what your campus really thinks. Ask questions about what want to know about your campus, take surveys, analyze results, and anonymously discuss topics with other students while earning rewards.
[EXPLORE THE STUDENT PORTAL](https://collegepulse.com/<https:/survey.collegepulse.com/jfe/form/SV_43mY8ilFgAsMoAe>)
![Phone right](https://collegepulse.com/)![Phone right](https://collegepulse.com/static/986c545b23acafd5cdc64e0fe6b5c80a/21564/new_phone2.png)
![College Pulse Logo](https://collegepulse.com/cp_logo_white.svg)
[![Facebook](https://collegepulse.com/icons/facebook.svg)](https://collegepulse.com/<https:/www.facebook.com/PulseSurvey/>)[![Twitter](https://collegepulse.com/icons/twitter.svg)](https://collegepulse.com/<https:/twitter.com/CollegeInsights>)[![Instagram](https://collegepulse.com/icons/instagram.svg)](https://collegepulse.com/<https:/www.instagram.com/college_pulse/>)

generated_description:
**College Pulse: The Voice of College Students**

College Pulse is carving out a unique niche in the research and analytics space, focusing specifically on college students. Based in San Francisco and founded as part of Y Combinator's S18 batch, College Pulse has rapidly grown into the leading provider of insight into the college demographic. With a team of just eight, they’ve managed to build a robust platform that connects businesses and organizations with the opinions of over 800,000 college students from more than 1,500 universities across all 50 states.

At its core, College Pulse's mission is simple yet powerful: to establish themselves as the definitive source for public opinion among college students—think of them as the "Google for public sentiment," but specifically in campus contexts. Their data-driven solutions help clients—ranging from businesses to nonprofit organizations—gain a better understanding of the college landscape.

### What They Offer

1. **Custom Research**: College Pulse collaborates closely with clients to design tailored research projects, whether it’s gathering insights from a specific major at a top university or a representative sample of students nationwide.

2. **Brand Tracking**: They maintain ongoing evaluations of consumer perceptions through brand trackers, helping organizations stay attuned to evolving student opinions.

3. **Syndicated Reports**: College Pulse produces comprehensive reports that analyze trends and insights within the college demographic, making this vital data accessible to their partners.

With over 130 million responses collected and a methodology refined by experts in polling, their reach and accuracy in understanding student opinions is unmatched. Their recent research includes notable projects like the Wall Street Journal/College Pulse 2025 Best College Rankings, showcasing their significant role in academic and public discourse.

### Client Partnerships

College Pulse's client roster includes major organizations and research institutions like the Knight Foundation, Chegg, and the Siena College Research Institute, all of whom praise College Pulse for their efficiency, rigor, and insightful reporting. Satisfied partners emphasize how College Pulse enhances their ability to engage with college students and influence outcomes based on data-backed insights.

### Conclusion

In a world where understanding young consumers' opinions is critical, College Pulse stands out by not just collecting data, but actively transforming it into actionable intelligence. If you want to get a real sense of what college students think, College Pulse is your go-to source. Check them out at [College Pulse](https://collegepulse.com/) and see how they’re crafting a more informed narrative around the college experience.
